fullplot: Jim is a young man who, after deciding he can't make it on his own, moves back to his hometown in Indiana -- under his parents' roof. He's saved from his family's dysfunction by a local woman and her son, who sees him as a father figure.
plot: Failing to make it on his own, twenty-seven-year-old Jim moves back in with his parents and deals with crippling family obligations.
title: Lonesome Jim
